snippet: The British pharmaceutical giant has agreed to sell two soft drink brands, Lucozade and Ribena, to Suntory Beverage and Food of Japan for £1.35 billion, or $2.1 billion.
abstract: The British pharmaceutical giant has agreed to sell two soft drink brands, Lucozade and Ribena, to Suntory Beverage and Food of Japan for £1.35 billion, or $2.1 billion.

headline.main: Glaxo to Sell Drink Brands for $2.1 Billion
